turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order a pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, where would you like to order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Benny's Pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, and what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, we are having a little party so I would like 2 extra large pizzas

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, and what type of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thick for both

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, and what toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pepperoni on one and pineapple on the other

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Would you like any sides with that?`

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And is this for pickup or delivery

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pick up please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok sounds good, and will you be paying cash in person or paying with me via credit card?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Credit card

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, go ahead with your card number when you are ready

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok and experation dates and 3 digit code on the back please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you, and just to confirm you would like two extra large pizzas with thick crust, one with pepperoni and with pineapple, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your total comes to $28.8 and will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes, and your receipt will be sent to your mobile phone

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you and have a great day!
